product_name: Royal Robbins Windjammer Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight, weather-resistant and easy to stuff in your backpack, the Royal Robbins Windjammer women's jacket is great to keep nearby in case of surprise showers. Durable Water Repellent finish resists stains and repels light rain; tightly-woven polyester microfiber fabric provides wind- and wrinkle-resistance. With a UPF 40+ rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Full-length front zipper features an inside draft flap; chin guard protects from abrasion; off-shoulder seams minimize chafing. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuff tabs seal in warmth; adjustable hood provides added protection. Includes zippered hand pockets; left hand pocket doubles as a stuff sack; 1 chest pocket;. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight, weather-resistant and easy to stuff in your backpack, the Royal Robbins Windjammer women's jacket is great to keep nearby in case of surprise showers.
